sentence.Network_en: "Monopoly" is one of the best-selling games of all time.
sentence.Network_cn: “大富翁”是有史以来最畅销的游戏之一。

sentence.Network_en: The dollar fell to within a hair's breadth of its all-time low.
sentence.Network_cn: 美元差一点跌到了最低点。

sentence.Network_en: The president's popularity nationally is at an all-time low.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统在全国的人气目前正处于历史最低点。

entry.tran: 迄今最…的；空前的；创纪录的
entry.def: You use all-time when you are comparing all the things of a particular type that there have ever been. For example, if you say that something is the all-time best, you mean that it is the best thing of its type that there has ever been.

example.ex: The president's popularity nationally is at an all-time low...
example.tran: 总统在全国的人气目前正处于历史最低点。

example.ex: Duane Eddy is John Peel's all-time favourite artist.
example.tran: 杜安·艾迪是约翰·皮尔迄今最喜欢的艺术家。

means.word_mean: 1. unsurpassed in some respect up to the present;
